anc_survey.title: intent
anc_survey.content:
Thank you for taking the time to answer our questions! ğŸŒŸ 

Remember, going to all your pregnancy check-ups is the best way to make sure that you and baby stay healthy ğŸ’ªğŸ½ 

During pregnancy, your body changes a lot. The earlier a possible problem with you or baby is identified, the quicker it can be treated.

anc_survey.title: not_going_next_one
